title: Anything going to be done about this whole Warwick situation?
body:
Probably going to stop playing league if nothing gets done about Warwick.
Past 5 games I've vs-ed Warwick, if not more.

Here's the deal:
I get fed, start to carry, Warwick comes in and one-shots me.
I get fed, start to carry, think ahead buy QSS.. Warwick takes away half of my HP and I'm left unable to do enough in team fights if not die from the half a second I'm silenced.

Is it my positioning? No, because he saves his flash just to flash ulti me, and me only. Which is around every fight or every second fight.

He gets assists by giving his teammates the buff from his W which gives him devour stacks.... T^T 

Thought process of Warwick:
Farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, level 6 -> gank -> Ult -> smite -> q, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, gank -> Ult -> smite -> q, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, gank -> Ult -> smite -> q, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, gank -> Ult -> smite -> q, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, -> gank -> Ult -> smite -> q, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, gank -> Ult -> smite -> q, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, farm, gank -> Ult -> smite. Victory!

Riot pls.

replies.body: He is definitely beatable, i once versed a warwick he was 22/6 or so. We were lucky enough to catch him out about 50 mins in the game, even 1v5 we could barely kill him though. If he doesn't get banned theres slight chance of winning.
Anything is beatable, but his dmg is broken lets be honest. Low risk high reward.

ww has been nerfed as of the recent qss price change, you shouldn't just %%%%% on forums because you can't play against a champ, ww is certainly not overpowered and does not need a nerf, there is alot more to a game than farming and ulting

> ww has been nerfed as of the recent qss price change, you shouldn't just %%%%% on forums because you can't play against a champ, ww is certainly not overpowered and does not need a nerf, there is alot more to a game than farming and ulting

I find this funny coming from a silver player.

> > ww has been nerfed as of the recent qss price change, you shouldn't just %%%%% on forums because you can't play against a champ, ww is certainly not overpowered and does not need a nerf, there is alot more to a game than farming and ulting
> 
> I find this funny coming from a silver player.

i find it funny that you think my rank directly relates to my knowledge
Good point, it's just a coincidence.
Uncalled for. Poor logic.

I find it even funnier when your level 13.
(And don't give me some diamond smurf bull****)

> ww has been nerfed as of the recent qss price change, you shouldn't just %%%%% on forums because you can't play against a champ, ww is certainly not overpowered and does not need a nerf, there is alot more to a game than farming and ulting

[Here are the facts](http://www.lolking.net/champions) ->> Sort champions by win rate. Warwick's standard deviation value is off the charts. This is across all servers.

Warwick is currently way over-powered. There's no arguing against statistics like that. Don't defend something unless you know the facts about it.

I've only played WW once since new jungle came out and it was honestly hilarious watching the enemy team be so scared of me that they willingly leave whoever gets caught by my ult to die instead of just canceling it instantly and bursting me down with ignite.

> I've only played WW once since new jungle came out and it was honestly hilarious watching the enemy team be so scared of me that they willingly leave whoever gets caught by my ult to die instead of just canceling it instantly and bursting me down with ignite.

Interrupting his ult doesn't stop the damage, it will hit for the full amount no matter what.
I know I've said it before lol...
just ban the c#nt, congrats, you just countered Warwick.

Just got a penta right now, last enemy champion being Warwick, me having QSS and me then stabbing him using Talon.

His damage right now is broken, yes. If you don't have a QSS or your support isn't smart enough to buy a {{item:3222}}, you're %%%%ed.

Hurts even more than Cleanse doesn't remove suppression (I know, it's pretty stupid.)

well if they didn't take out executioner's calling then we would be able to AT LEAST stand a chance against a fed warwick

in the meantime all we can do is try to shutdown a warwick early game x_x
why is he smiting AFTER ulting? he would be losing a ton of on hit damage by doing it that way...
Well its ult and smite at the same time. but whatever.
smiting after the ult either doesnt do the smite damage, OR cancels ult. happened a few times to me that ult did nothing cos i smited late.

I completely agree with you 100%, but i also have to say that in pick/ban phase you have 3 bans, request WW be banned, and if your captain then simple, **instaban him!**


if your playing in blinds and team builder well... not much can be done atm.


they are giving him a rework so till then just ban.
He is too boring to play as it is, let him be a little OP lol.

WW is a pleb, Rek dat fgt.
If you don't wanna vs him then either ban or first pick him. 
If you are playing normals, who dafuq cares anyway.

just play jax.

gg ez.

Ult -> smite -> Q ?

What a terrible combo.

According to the lolking someone linked before hes got a 90% ban rate with a 60% win rate.

Theres definitely a problem with him :/
If you see a ww ranked, simply pick a champion who can counter jungle with ease and shut him down, or play {{champion:72}}... {{champion:72}} is love {{champion:72}}  is life
Just Ban HIM

If he's getting fed from farming then you need to start taking his jungle.

If he's getting fed from ganking then you're not warding/watching map

He is definitely a problem and it's a huge pain to see him so often. It's making the game very boring and repetitive, so I wouldn't be surprised to see some Warwick nerfs very soon.
I doubt he would be nerfed much directly anytime soon since he is getting a full rework in the near future.

Just dodge th...

Oh wait.
I'm glad he's popular now because people never used him. Old school junglers WW and Fiddle :3

Best advice I can give ya is keep the CC available until he ults. He's a problem but it's manageable. Keep grouped and don't get caught. Early game, keep wards a plenty. Also he's banned quite frequently in ranked.
